Trade/Device Name(s): Rapid Forsure One Step Multiple Drug Screen Test Device
Forsure One Step Multiple (Up to Six) Drug Screen Test Card for Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Bezoylecgonine, 11-nor-Δ-9-Tetrahydrocannabinol-9-carboxylic acid, Morphine and Phencyclidine
Submitter Information: Tianjin New Bay Bioresearch Co., Ltd.
Regulation Name(s): Amphetamine, Methamphetamine, Benzoylecgonine, THC Morphine and Phencyclidine test system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Forsure One Step Multiple Drug Screen Test Card, a visual immunochromatographic assay for qualitative detection of up to six drugs of abuse in human urine.
Indications for Use Summary: Prescription assay for professional use in central laboratories, providing qualitative screening results for amphetamine, methamphetamine, benzoylecgonine, THC, morphine, and phencyclidine in human urine; intended only as a preliminary test with GC/MS recommended for confirmation.
